attributes.action: Make loved British singer Elkie Brooks a DAME.
attributes.additional_details: Elkie is still touring and delighting audiences.  Several newspapers and thousands of fans feel that she should be recognised for her 60 years of delighting fans all over the world and showcasing the best of British culture.
attributes.background: Recognise Elkie Brooks for her service to British music with a dame-hood in her 80th year.

rejection.details:
The Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition. 

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
